channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: Trump threatens to take over DC police again over immigration enforcement
Does Israel face a 'South Africa moment' over Gaza?
item.description: BBC diplomatic correspondent Paul Adams looks at parallels between reactions to Israel and apartheid-era South Africa.

item.title: US says 'framework' for TikTok ownership deal agreed with China
item.description: The deal will pave the way to US ownership of the social media platform' s American operations, according to the US treasury secretary.

item.description: President Trump announced Monday the U.S. military has carried out a second strike on alleged Venezuelan "narcoterrorists."

item.title: Another endangered orca in Washington state is seen carrying a dead calf
item.description: An endangered orca​ in Washington state was seen carrying her dead newborn calf in what appears to be an effort to revive it.

item.title: US destroys alleged Venezuelan drug boat, killing three
item.description: The attack came after the Venezuelan president said Caracas would defend itself against US "aggression".
